definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Thekeydriver behind the increase will come from basic set-top boxes.
sentences.chinese: 增长背后的主要驱动力来自于基础机顶盒市场。

sentences.english: Select Next to continue without setting up your set-top box.
sentences.chinese: 选择“下一步”在未设置机顶盒的情况下继续安装。

sentences.english: The demultiplexor plays a key role in set top box(STB).
sentences.chinese: 解复用器在机顶盒中扮演了一个关键的角色。

sentences.english: In this respect, think of it as cable television without the need for a set-top-box.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，可以把它看作不需要机顶盒的有线电视。

sentences.english: Sky also hopes to bring the service to mobile phones and set-top boxes.
sentences.chinese: 天空还希望能将这项业务拓展到手机服务和机顶盒。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a solution of PTI (Programmable Transport Interface) of set-top-box system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种数字机顶盒系统中可编程传输接口的方案。

sentences.english: Save your TV show to your digital set-top box for later viewing instead.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把电视节目存在机顶盒里，晚点再看。

sentences.english: The Worldwide Cable Set Top Box Market: Record-Setting Growth Contin…
sentences.chinese: 全球有线电视机顶盒市场研究报告。

sentences.english: This article describes the full-speed USB in the TV set-top box on the extended application.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了全速USB在电视机顶盒上的扩展应用。

sentences.english: The interactive television application may allow the user to record programs on a set-top box.
sentences.chinese: 交互式电视应用可允许用户在机顶盒上记录节目。

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4
